dcterms:description: A whole-body FDG-PET/CT dataset with manually annotated tumor lesions, consisting of three cancer phenotypes: lymphoma, lung cancer, and melanoma, as well as healthy control patients.
dcterms:title: AutoPET

dcterms:description: Overview of the HECKTOR challenge at MICCAI 2021, focusing on automatic head and neck tumor segmentation and outcome prediction in PET/CT images.
dcterms:title: HECKTOR
